gw.plugin.cluster

Interface ClusterBroadcastTransport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClusterTransport

    public interface ClusterBroadcastTransport
extends ClusterTransport
    Used to send broadcast notifications with the Guidewire cluster. User: akorostov Date: 2/28/13

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(byte[] message)
      Sends notification to all members of the Guidewire cluster.

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.plugin.cluster.ClusterTransport

        getName, getStatistics, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(byte[] message)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Sends notification to all members of the Guidewire cluster.
        Parameters:
        message - notification to send.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs.
